prompts.title: Arctic Glacier Valley
prompts.prompt: Grungy analog photo, late 90s/early 2000s style, of the 'arctic avenger' terrorist character model from counter-strike 1.6. he's sitting hunched in an old office chair behind a cluttered desk dominated by a bulky, glowing crt monitor in a dimly lit, messy room. crucially, he is wearing his exact, distinct in-game clothing and gear

prompts.title: Mountain Forest Scene
prompts.prompt: Majestic mountain forest with towering pine trees, misty morning atmosphere, golden hour lighting filtering through the canopy, creating dramatic shadows and ethereal beams of light

prompts.title: Ocean Sunset Vista
prompts.prompt: Spectacular ocean sunset with vibrant orange and pink clouds reflected in calm waters, silhouette of distant islands on the horizon, peaceful and serene atmosphere

prompts.title: Desert Dunes Landscape
prompts.prompt: Vast desert landscape with rolling sand dunes, dramatic shadows cast by the setting sun, sparse vegetation scattered throughout, endless horizon stretching into the distance

prompts.title: Tropical Waterfall Paradise
prompts.prompt: Hidden tropical waterfall cascading into a crystal clear pool, surrounded by lush green vegetation, exotic flowers and ferns, rays of sunlight penetrating the jungle canopy

prompts.title: Urban Cityscape Night
prompts.prompt: Modern cityscape at night with illuminated skyscrapers, bustling streets with car light trails, neon signs reflecting on wet pavement after rain
